title: Scoreboard - Spamming/Flashing
body: I've just gotten a Magicforce 68 tenkeyless mechanical keyboard and when I get into games, holding down the TAB key will show the scoreboard for a few seconds, and then it will start to flash, as if the TAB key is being pressed like a manic. Is there any settings that I can do in order to disable the TAB key from repeating itself?

replies.body: actaullly just bought one of their keyboards and for some reason had the same problem but FN+W fixes the bug.

I'm not familiar with this keyboard, but it's certainly beautiful.  To troubleshoot and rule out possibilities, your best bet is to test Tab on a different keyboard and see if it still spams.  If not, then your new one may have an issue or setting causing it to do that.  If that's the case, you should ht up their manufacturer's support and see if there's a way to disable it.  Good luck!
